title: whse_basemapping.fwa_named_streams
description: Named streams of BC, aggregated per watershed group and simplified using a 25m tolerance (primarily for mapping use)

properties.name: gnis_name
properties.description: The BCGNIS (BC Geographical Names Information System) name associated with the stream

properties.name: blue_line_key
properties.description: The blue line key of the named stream, see FWA documentation for blue_line_key description

properties.name: stream_order
properties.description: The maximum stream order associated with the stream name

properties.name: watershed_group_code
properties.description: The watershed group code associated with the named stream
